mindustry.game

Class GlobalData

  • java.lang.Object
    • mindustry.game.GlobalData

  • public class GlobalData
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores player unlocks. Clientside only.

      • unlockContent

        public void unlockContent(UnlockableContent content)
        Makes this piece of content 'unlocked', if possible. If this piece of content is already unlocked, nothing changes. Results are not saved until you call save().

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Clears all unlocked content. Automatically saves.
